title: Polymarket disputes capture of Maduro amounted to invasion
description: More than $10.5mn has been wagered on contracts seeking to predict when the US will ‘invade’ Venezuela
content: More than $10.5mn has been wagered on contracts seeking to predict when the US will ‘invade’ Venezuela
